biography_text: CRENSHAW, Daniel, a Representative from Texas; born in Aberdeen, Scotland, March 14, 1984; B.A., Tufts University, Medford, Mass., 2006; M.P.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2017; United States Navy, 2006-2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
